Email_Draft.subject: Follow-Up on Proposal Review
Email_Draft.body:
Hi Sophia,

I wanted to follow up regarding the proposal I sent over. Have you had a chance to discuss it with your RevOps lead? Please let me know if there are any questions or if you need further clarification on any points.

Looking forward to your feedback!

Best,
Bruce
